verses.verse: Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> to me, <S%H430><s%> God, for man <S%H582><s%> wants to swallow me up. <S%H7602><s%> All day <S%H3117><s%> long, <S%H3898><s%> he attacks and oppresses me. <S%H3905><s%>
My enemies <S%H8324><s%> want to swallow <S%H7602><s%> me up all day <S%H3117><s%> long, <S%H4791><s%> for they are many <S%H7227><s%> who fight proudly against me. <S%H3898><s%>
When <S%H3117><s%> I am afraid, <S%H3372><s%> I will put my trust in you. <S%H982><s%>

In God, <S%H430><s%> I praise <S%H1984><s%> his word. <S%H1697><s%> In God, <S%H430><s%> I put my trust. <S%H982><s%> I will not be afraid. <S%H3372><s%> What can flesh <S%H1320><s%> do to me? <S%H6213><s%>
All day <S%H3117><s%> long they twist <S%H6087><s%> my words. <S%H1697><s%> All their thoughts <S%H4284><s%> are against me for evil. <S%H7451><s%>
They conspire <S%H1481><s%> and lurk, <S%H6845><s%> watching <S%H8104><s%> my steps, <S%H6119><s%> they are eager <S%H6960><s%> to take my life. <S%H5315><s%>
Shall they escape <S%H6405><s%> by iniquity? <S%H205><s%> In anger <S%H639><s%> cast down <S%H3381><s%> the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>
You number <S%H5608><s%> my wanderings. <S%H5112><s%> You put <S%H7760><s%> my tears <S%H1832><s%> into your bottle. <S%H4997><s%> Aren't <S%H5612><s%> they in your book?
Then my enemies <S%H341><s%> shall turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H268><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that I call. <S%H7121><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> this, <S%H430><s%> that God is for me.
In God, <S%H430><s%> I will praise <S%H1984><s%> his word. <S%H1697><s%> In Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> I will praise <S%H1984><s%> his word. <S%H1697><s%>
I have put my trust <S%H982><s%> in God. <S%H430><s%> I will not be afraid. <S%H3372><s%> What can man <S%H120><s%> do to me? <S%H6213><s%>
Your vows <S%H5088><s%> are on me, <S%H430><s%> God. I will give <S%H7999><s%> thank offerings to you. <S%H8426><s%>

For you have delivered <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from death, <S%H4194><s%> and prevented my feet <S%H7272><s%> from falling, <S%H1762><s%> that I may walk <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%> in the light <S%H216><s%> of the living. <S%H2416><s%>
